resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106914</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106914</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086486</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Movement of People and Goods</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung der Leute und der Waren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Circulation des personnes et des marchandises</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Movimento dos povos e dos bens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Movimento della gente e delle merci</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κυκλοφορία των ατόμων και των εμπορευμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Movimiento de la gente y de mercancías</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A collection of downloadable video clips on the theme of Movement of People and Goods, with guiding questions for students. Clips are drawn from the following PBS WIDE ANGLE documentaries: "To Have and Have Not" (2002), "Border Jumpers" (2005).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Ansammlung downloadable videoclips auf dem 
Thema der Bewegung der Leute und der Waren, mit leitenden Fragen für 
Kursteilnehmer. Clips werden von den folgenden PBS 
Weitwinkeldokumentarfilmen gezeichnet: "haben und haben nicht" 
(2002), "Rand-Überbrücker" (2005).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une collection de clips visuels downloadable sur 
le thème de la circulation des personnes et des marchandises, avec 
des questions de guidage pour des étudiants. Des clips sont 
tirés des documentaires GRANDS-ANGULAIRES suivants de PBS : 
"pour avoir et Démuni" (2002), "cavaliers de cadre" (2005).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma coleção de grampos video downloadable no 
tema do movimento dos povos e dos bens, com perguntas guiando para 
estudantes. Os grampos são desenhados dos seguintes 
documentaries LARGOS do ÂNGULO de PBS: "para ter e ter não" 
(2002), da "ligações em ponte beira" (2005).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una collezione di video clip downloadable sul tema
di movimento della gente e delle merci, con le domande guidanti per 
gli allievi. Le clip sono estratte dai seguenti documentaries 
GRANDANGOLARI di PBS: "per avere ed avere non" (2002), 
"ponticelli del bordo" (2005).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια συλλογή των τηλεκατεγραφόμενων τηλεοπτικών 
συνδετήρων στο θέμα της κυκλοφορίας των ατόμων και των 
εμπορευμάτων, με την καθοδήγηση των ερωτήσεων για τους σπουδαστές.
Οι συνδετήρες προέρχονται από τα ακόλουθα ντοκιμαντέρ 
PBS WIDE.ANGLE: "Για να έχει και να έχει όχι" 
(2002), "άλτες συνόρων" (2005).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una colección de clips video downloadable en el 
tema del movimiento de la gente y de mercancías, con las preguntas de
guía para los estudiantes. Los clips se trazan de los 
documentaries GRANANGULARES siguientes de PBS: "para tener y 
tener no" (2002), "puentes de la frontera" (2005).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086486</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106914</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/movement-of-people-and-goods</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
